Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine

The BPEL engine, support classes, and engine factory.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeEngineLifecycleWrapper Interface for controlling interactions with the BPEL engine from the servlet entry point.
IAeInvokeHandlerFactory Factory interface for the creation of IAeInvokeHandler impls.
IAePersistentProcessManager Persistent version of the process manager.
IAeProcessLogger Interface for class that logs process events for the engine.
IAeProcessRecovery Defines interface for recovering processes.
IAeReceiveHandlerFactory Factory interface for the creation of IAeReceiveHandler impls.
IAeRecoverableProcessManager Recoverable version of the process manager.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractServerEngine Base class for engines that run within a server environment.
AeBpelEngine The runtime BPEL engine.
AeBpelEngine.AeDispatchReceiveRunnableHelper Helper class for executing the call to dispatch receive asynchronously Note: This class is now declared as static and Serializable (via IAeInputMessageWork) to support customers who may want to transfer input message work items from one machine to another.
AeBpelEngine.AeProcessExecutionRunnableHelper Helper class for asynchronous process execution Note: This class is now declared as static and Serializable (via IAeInputMessageWork) to support customers who may want to transfer input message work items from one machine to another.
AeBpelEngine.AeServerPartnerLinkStrategy Implements the partner link strategy for the server business process engine.
AeBPELProcessEventFormatter Basic BPEL Engine Event formatting.
AeDelegatingHandlerFactory An abstract handler factory that delegates to other factories based on the protocol in the URN.
AeEngineAdministration Provides administration/console support for the engine.
AeEngineFactory Maintains a singleton instance of the engine.
AeEngineLifecycleWrapper ActiveBPEL IAeEngineHandler impl.
AeInMemoryQueueManager Queue Mananger for server side operations.
AeInMemoryQueueManager.AeAlarmListener Inner class used to encapsulate the alarm work in its own thread.
AeInvokeHandlerFactory Factory access to the appropriate IAeInvokeHandler for a given IAeInvoke object.
AeInvokeHandlerUri Utility methods for parsing the custom invoker uri.
AeMessageQueue Provides a method for dispatching messages into the engine.
AePersistentProcessManager Implements process manager that persists processes to an instance of IAeStorage.
AePersistentProcessRecovery Implements recovering processes from persistent process storage.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine Description

The BPEL engine, support classes, and engine factory. Includes the process manager, queue manager, and timer services and administration/console support for the engine.
